summary: Last Days in the Desert is an American drama film about the temptation of Christ, directed and written by Rodrigo García. It stars Ewan McGregor, Tye Sheridan, Ciarán Hinds and Ayelet Zurer. The film premiered at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival on January 25, 2015, and began a limited theatrical release on May 13, 2016.
plot: Last Days in the Desert follows Jesus in an imagined chapter from his 40 days of fasting and praying in the desert. On his way out of the wilderness, he struggles with Satan over the fate of an ordinary family in crisis, setting for himself a dramatic test with distinctly human conflicts.
cast:
Ewan McGregor as Yeshua and Satan
Tye Sheridan as Son
Ciarán Hinds as Father
Ayelet Zurer as Mother
